entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is being addressed by Moody.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A famous Auror and Death Eater, who has a magical eye and is speaking to Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's friend, mentioned as the famous Auror who caught many Death Eaters.

entities.name: the dark lord
entities.description: The leader of the Death Eaters, who is referred to by Moody in his speech.

relationships.description: Moody is speaking directly to Harry, as indicated by the use of 'you' in his speech.
Moody claims that he has done a favor for the Dark Lord, and will be rewarded by him.
